recipe.ingredients: 4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, 1/4 cup fresh lemon juice, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 3 cloves garlic, minced, 1 tablespoon fresh rosemary, finely chopped, 1 tablespoon fresh thyme, finely chopped, 1 tablespoon fresh parsley, finely chopped, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, Lemon wedges for garnish
recipe.directions: In a small bowl, whisk together lemon juice, olive oil, minced garlic, rosemary, thyme, parsley, salt, and black pepper to create the marinade. Place chicken breasts in a large zip-top plastic bag and pour the marinade over the chicken. Seal the bag and ensure that chicken is well coated. Refrigerate for at least 1 hour, or up to 4 hours, turning the bag occasionally, Preheat the grill to medium-high heat. Remove the chicken from the marinade and discard the excess marinade. Grill the chicken until it is cooked through and internal temperature reaches 165Â°F, about 5-7 minutes per side, depending on thickness, Serve the grilled chicken breasts with lemon wedges on the side. Garnish with additional fresh herbs, if desired.
